# 2021 Chardonnay
Eola Amity & Chehalem Mountains
## Balanced, Crisp & Bursting with Citrus
For 2021, we have created a lovely Chardonnay, sourcing our grapes from both the Eola-Amity & Chehalem Mountains AVAs.
